data.quote: How lucky I am to have something that makes saying goodbye so hard.
data.author: Winnie the Pooh

data.quote: Nothing is foolproof for a sufficiently talented fool.
data.author: /u/c00yt825

data.quote: My mother said to me, 'If you are a soldier, you will become a general. If you are a monk, you will become the Pope.' Instead, I was a painter, and became Picasso.
data.author: Pablo Picasso

data.quote: You have no responsibility to live up to what other people think you ought to accomplish. I have no responsibility to be like they expect me to be. It's their mistake, not my failing.
data.author: Richard P. Feynman

data.quote: The reason we struggle with insecurity is because we compare our behind-the-scenes with everyone elseâ€™s highlight reel.
data.author: Steve Furtick

data.quote: The whole problem with the world is that fools and fanatics are always so certain of themselves, and wiser people so full of doubts.
data.author: Bertrand Russell

data.quote: The master has failed more times than the beginner has even tried.
data.author: Stephen McCranie

data.quote: And now that you don't have to be perfect, you can be good
data.author: John Steinbeck

data.quote: A ship is safe in a harbor. But thats not what ships are for.
data.author: /u/the_big_mothergoose

data.quote: Never attribute to malice that which is adequately explained by stupidity.
data.author: Jargon File

data.quote: We are all in the gutter, but some of us are looking at the stars.
data.author: Oscar Wilde

data.quote: We judge ourselves by our intentions and others by their behaviour.
data.author: Stephen M.R. Covey

data.quote: Don't waste your time on jealousy. Sometimes you're ahead. Sometimes you're behind. The race is long. And in the end, it's only with yourself
data.author: Mary Schmich

data.quote: Don't do something permanently stupid when you're temporarily upset.
data.author: /u/joepamps

data.quote: What luck for rulers that men do not think
data.author: Adolf Hitler

data.quote: I will either find a way, or make one
data.author: Hannibal

data.quote: Life does not stop and start at your convenience, you miserable piece of shit
data.author: Walter Sobchak
